name: InvokeRESTAPI
description: Invoke REST API as a part of your process.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Generic Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a generic endpoint that should be used to pick the url and construct authorization header for the http request.

inputs.name: method
inputs.label: Method
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the http method with which the API should be invoked with.

inputs.name: headers
inputs.label: Headers
inputs.helpMarkDown: Define header in JSON format. The header shall be attached with request to be sent.

inputs.name: urlSuffix
inputs.label: URL suffix string
inputs.helpMarkDown: Suffix string to append to the function Url.

inputs.name: waitForCompletion
inputs.label: Wait For Completion
inputs.helpMarkDown: The task will wait for the TaskCompleted event to be fired by the REST API invoked. Wait period will be equivalent to task timeout mentioned in control section below.
